hero.title: Kusimbisa Pfungwa, Kugadzira Ramangwana
hero.subtitle: Regisbridge Private School - Chikoro chakasarudzika chezuva nehusiku muZimbabwe

about.title: Nezve Regisbridge
about.subtitle: Nhaka Yekunaka Mudzidzo
about.description: Regisbridge Private School yanga ichipa dzidzo yepamusoro kwemakore anopfuura makumi maviri, ichibatanidza kuomarara kwezvidzidzo nekuvandudza hunhu munzvimbo inorera.
about.missionText: Kupa dzidzo yakazara inosimudzira kuda kuziva, kutendeseka, uye unyanzvi hwehutungamiriri muvadzidzi vedu.
about.visionText: Kuva nzvimbo yekutanga yedzidzo muZimbabwe, inozivikanwa nekunaka kwezvidzidzo nekuvandudza hunhu.

academics.title: Kunaka Kwezvidzidzo
academics.subtitle: Chirongwa Chakazara Chekubudirira
academics.description: Chirongwa chedu chedzidzo chinobatanidza chirongwa cheCambridge International nezvinodiwa zvomunharaunda, zvichiita kuti vadzidzi vagadzirirwe mikana yemuno neyekunze.

boarding.title: Hupenyu Hwekugara
boarding.subtitle: Imba Kure Neimba
boarding.description: Nzvimbo dzedu dzekugara dzinopa nharaunda yakachengeteka inorera apo vadzidzi vanosimudzira kuzvimirira, mutoro, uye hushamwari hwemuhupenyu hwose.

footer.description: Regisbridge Private School - Kusimbisa pfungwa, kugadzira ramangwana kubva 2000.
